website_summaries.verdict: A lower-cost option from Kohler's Highline Collection, this toilet comes with 3 bolts for easier installation and stands as tall as a regular chair.
pros: It's basic, but it saves water, and it can save the buyer money on upfront costs
cons: It may leak slightly, though caulking can help
The overall package is not as solid as some pricier Kohler options

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied due to false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with a seat or toilet flange bolts. It also wasn’t 17-19”. It measured slightly over 16.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Kohler knock off?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not even sure this is a real Kohler toilet. It came in an unmarked box, not a kohler box (as every other kohler product does). Most kohler toilets have marked under their name on the toilet the GPF and this one does not (it actually looks like the kohler writing is going to rub off). And the handle is very cheap and looks like it will break anyway now. My plumber was very confused by the whole thing but I wasn’t home when it was installed, and so I’m keeping it until it breaks. Definitely do not make my mistake- go to a plumbing store if you are looking for an actual Kohler toilet
customer_reviews.author: Jilla300

customer_reviews.title: Take the plunge!
customer_reviews.text: Taking the plunge to have a toilet arrive at your front door is daunting. This unit was well packed and arrived in perfect condition. Easy to assemble and the recommended toilet seat fits well. The flushing mechanism is different from other toilets but appears to do the trick with a low water flush. The 18 inch height with seat is hard to find, so this purchase is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tall toilet for giants or old people with bad knees.
customer_reviews.text: It is noticably taller than the ordinary commode, and flushes easily with minimal water. We attached a cool-water bidet seat and a free-standing toilet frame arm support, and are super happy with the result. It's only been a week, but if anything changes, I'll repost.
customer_reviews.author: Jr Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Review Overall
customer_reviews.text: The directions could be more clear and concise. The wax seal I purchased was included as a suggestion at my time of purchase and we ended up tossing it out and purchasing the old fashioned wax seals. The toilet itself is a nice one. I was thinking it would be a little bit taller than it is. Also, for the price of the unit I think the flushing handle is pretty chintzy. So a mixed review at this point.
customer_reviews.author: ColorStreetStylist

customer_reviews.title: Not working right
customer_reviews.text: We bought this from Amazon and unlike most other items ordered from there has not functioned correctly. Have had to call plumber. It does not shut off after flushing but runs all the time. At times it also keeps intermittent running of water, stopping and starting to drip again. Don’t know if we will have to replace innards. Plumber can’t return until after holidays. Luckily we have another bathroom in house that we can use. We are avoiding this one.
customer_reviews.author: Evp

customer_reviews.title: sit down without knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is a very large bowl, and it is high enough to make sitting easy, it flushes fast and completely. The only problem I had, was the china caps that go on top of the closet bolts were in the box with the water tank. I installed the bowl first, and I had to take the nuts off the bolts to put the caps on, when I found them, but that was not a hard thing to do. It would make sense to put the bolt caps in the bowl box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived later than originally predicted by days but worse when I opened the box it was only the bowl. The tank does not come in the package....It's not like the tanks was missing from the box there was never a place for the tank to be in the box. I wound up buying this exact toilet a Lowes because I had hired a plumber to be onsite that day..... I bought that exact same complete toilet with the seat and wax ring for $30 less at regular price at Lowes
customer_reviews.author: Crashartist

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Number 1, it was easy to install; number 2 , I like the chair height. #1 and #2, that just about covers it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: I recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: We love love love this toilet! It is the best - so comfy and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie413

customer_reviews.title: No double flushes
customer_reviews.text: In California, you have to get a 1.28 gallon toilet so I put off replacing my old one until I really had to. I figured you'd have to do double flushes a lot, but surprisingly I have never yet had to do so. The flush is fast and not too loud. It also has enough room between the bowl and the tank to install a bidet seat, which I did.
customer_reviews.author: aroundawhile

customer_reviews.title: Received in Shanghai
customer_reviews.text: Ordered October 31 was scheduled for delivery Nov 26 but arrived Nov 3. Kohler, American Standard are manufactured in China but there are no Comfort Height models available. I was concerned about this one because of unfavorable comments so tried to order 2 different models, one on Amazon and one on ebay but both fell through because of shipping. The order arrived in Shanghai early. The toilet height is 16.5 inches, an full 1.5 inches higher the the one we had. Toilets in China are low as are chairs etc. VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A Gilbert Jr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get clogged
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toilet, never clogs. I have a cheaper brand I installed in another bathroom (1/3 the price). I will never go cheap again, pay a little more for a far superior product.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bowl. Wish I got it for the other bathroom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Bowl was not shipped.
customer_reviews.text: I only received the tank. I did not receive the bowl. This is beyond frustrating!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: timothy a robertson

customer_reviews.title: Flushes like a dream !
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest ever ! It flushes using very little water and never leaves anything in the bowl ! The height is great and makes if easier for old people to getup and down. I would like to have another in master bath !
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean until you get to the back of the base.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy Install, nice form and fit, works outstandingly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Met our expectations in terms of functionality, installation and value.
customer_reviews.author: Irene K.

customer_reviews.title: Why do  have to pay shipping back?
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect shipping costs were almost as much as the product, nor that I had to pay it.
customer_reviews.author: John Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Arrived needing a new flush valve!
customer_reviews.text: I like the height and look of this toilet. It may have deserved a 4 or 5 but alas it needs a new flush valve and has done so since the minute it was installed. Kholer have been wonderful and sent out a replacement valve straightaway. I now however have to pay a plumber to come out and fit the new valve.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Allan

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: came well packaged. Thought it wouldn't make it but; Was wrong and very happy and the cost was less than I could get in a big box store at the time I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Defective toilet, Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and installed the toilet in February, by November the darn thing fell apart and started leaking. Looks like a defective unit that someone tried to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this through a new home builder. Excellent choice. Comfortable height and flushes well with only 1.28 gallons of water. If you should want a bit more water for particularly heavy flush, you can hold the flush lever down for a second or two. But we have had no problem flushing without doing that. Tank refills quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bstnh1

customer_reviews.title: Buy a plunger with it...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and it’s great to sit on, but it clogs twice as much as the thirty year old throne it replaced. Very stubborn clogs too. Maybe Koehler has a deal with the Korky Plunger Company because I’ve had to plunge this thing A LOT in the six months I’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Swanson

product_meta.title: Kohler K-3999-0 Highline Comfort Height Two-piece Elongated 1.28 Gpf Toilet with Class Five Flushing Technology And Left-hand Trip Lever, Seat Not Included, White
product_meta.description:
Comfort Height Elongated Toilet bowl - With a seat height comparable to that of a standard chair, Comfort Height toilets make sitting down and standing up easier for people of all ages.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Exceptional Performance. Exceptional Value. Wellworth toilets have been an American benchmark for innovation and performance since 1936. With a new design in 2011, the Wellworth toilet brings and elegant flare that complements a wide range of bathroom de.
feature_bullets: Comfort height elongated toilet bowl with a seat height comparable to that of a standard chair, Comfort height toilets make sitting down and standing up easier for people of all ages
12 inches rough in. Water sense toilets meet strict EPA flushing guidelines, including using at least 20 percent less water than 1.6-gallon toilets
29 to 1/2 inches (74.9 centimeter) x 18 (45.7 centimeter) x 31 to 1/4 (79.4 centimeter); Seat post hole centers: 5.5 inch
Class five(R) provides tremendous bulk waste flushing performance and best in class bowl cleanliness
3 bolt Installation three pre-installed tank bolts save installation time; For back to back toilet installations: Use only a 45 degree double wye fitting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
